--- title: Army Lists ---

NetEA Tournament Pack

The NetEA Tournament Pack contains all of the approved army lists as well as any rule extensions and Q&A's that accompany them. NetEA approved army lists are tournament ready and balanced against one another using the Epic tournament game rules. These lists vary slightly (point-cost and unit-stat-wise) from the official lists due to community feedback.

NetEA Army List Development

If you're interested in contributing (or just checking out what armies are being worked on) then head over to these Tactical Command forums:

  • Rules Amendments
  • Adeptus Astartes
  • Imperial Guard
  • Orks
  • Eldar
  • Chaos
  • Adeptus Mechanicus
  • Imperial Inquisition
  • Tau
  • Tyranids
  • Necrons
  • Squats
  • Other Forces

Other Epic Groups

Be sure to check out what the locals are using in your area too, there's other Epic Armageddon groups out there beyond NetEA!

  • Epic-UK
  • epic_fr
